summary: The diff modifies HomePage.tsx to render a circular emblem logo in the hero section using the path /assets/generated/logo-emblem.dim_512x512.png. However, the BuildRequest specifies the image should be saved and served from frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-emblem.png (not the .dim_512x512.png variant). The actual image file does not appear in the diff as an added file, meaning the static asset itself may not have been committed.

missing_requirements.reason: The diff references the image at /assets/generated/logo-emblem.dim_512x512.png in the src attribute, not logo-emblem.png as specified. Additionally, no new image file appears in the ADDED FILES section, so the static asset at the required path is not confirmed as added.
